title: Steel firm Rhetan TMT plans to set up 2 MW solar plant for captive use
description: Rhetan TMT Ltd plans to establish a 2 MW solar power plant at its Kadi manufacturing facility in Gujarat. The solar plant will be for captive use, reducing power costs and promoting green energy. The company's board will meet on Friday to approve the project. Rhetan TMT produces TMT Bars and Round Bars for the construction industry.
